name: @thattokengirl-utilities/http
description: An abstraction to make http requests

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version patch
